context.rdfs:comment: An entry point, within some Web-based protocol.
context.rdfs:label: EntryPoint

properties.rdfs:comment: An url template (RFC6570) that will be used to construct the target of the execution of the action.
properties.rdfs:label: urlTemplate

properties.rdfs:comment: An application that can complete the request.
properties.rdfs:label: actionApplication

properties.rdfs:comment: An application that can complete the request.
properties.rdfs:label: application

properties.rdfs:comment: The high level platform(s) where the Action can be performed for the given URL. To specify a specific application or operating system instance, use actionApplication.
properties.rdfs:label: actionPlatform

properties.rdfs:comment: An HTTP method that specifies the appropriate HTTP method for a request to an HTTP EntryPoint. Values are capitalized strings as used in HTTP.
properties.rdfs:label: httpMethod

properties.rdfs:comment: The supported encoding type(s) for an EntryPoint request.
properties.rdfs:label: encodingType

properties.rdfs:comment: The supported content type(s) for an EntryPoint response.
properties.rdfs:label: contentType
